item.title: Thousands released from prison because of Covid. Will they have to return?
item.description:

item.title: Al Qaeda chief in new video despite rumors he was dead...
item.description:
apnews.com
BEIRUT (AP) — Al-Qaida leader Ayman al-Zawahri appeared in a new video marking the 20th anniversary of the Sept. 11, attacks, months after rumors spread that he was dead. The SITE Intelligence Group that monitors jihadist websites said the video was released Saturday.

item.title: Wildfire forces closure of California freeway...
item.description:
apnews.com
CASTIAC, Calif. (AP) — A wildfire near Castaic Saturday has led to the closure of a part of a major freeway in Southern California, officials told local media. The fire, known as the Route Fire, reached 392 acres, or a little more than half a square mile, as of 6:28 p.m.

item.title: With Roe v. Wade in jeopardy, abortion advocates change strategy...
item.description:
news.yahoo.com
